actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend Title XI of the Social Security Act to establish work program demonstration projects under the Aid to Families with Dependent Children program.

summary.text: Reenacts the Authority for States to establish community work and training programs under the Aid to Families with Dependent Children program of Title IV of the Social Security Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend Title XI of the Social Security Act to establish work program demonstration projects under the Aid to Families with Dependent Children program.
